title: Things that annoy you about league outside of the gameplay
body:
For me

* When I am 100 or so RP off a skin and so I have to spend 10 dollars for 50 cents worth or RP

* When a game puts me a few ip off that rune/champ I wanted

* When my masteries or runes don't change correctly

* The champion select lobby lag
* When I spam click things and then when the notification goes away I click the news in the background 10+ times
* Having my eardrums ruptured every time LOL updates thanks to that annoying sound

Will add more later what are some things that annoy you outside of games?

replies.body:
I get so annoyed when I realize I'm not the mid laner for SKT anymore and it was just a dream

What happened?
When people invite me to games.
When you open League, but it never actually opens, making you open it again.

- When people who are friends of people on my friends list invite me to games.
- When people invite me to ranked duo.
- When I accept an invite just to realise it's a queue I don't want to play.
- When people decline or are inactive when matched with a team in queue.
- When people dodge at the last second of champ select.
- When the client automatically switches my status from away to online.

When:
1 - Riot forces things down our throats (Boards kinda, but I still reckon having a 'GD' section would've been better)
2 - When friends ask me for advice and then say something %%%%%%ed like "I ULT AS TRYN ON FULL HEALTH FOR THE FURY"...until this day he's still probably having trouble getting to Level 10 >___>
3 - When you're fking STUCK IN LOW PRIORITY QUEUE AND YOU STILL HAVE THE WAIT TIME LOOP BUG AND RIOT STILL HAS NO UNIVERSAL FIX TO IT
4 - When I would play 5 games of TeamBuilder because it has no wait time to get out of Low Priority Queue AND RIOT MAKES IT SO THAT TEAMBUILDER HAS IT EVEN THOUGH YOU NEED TO WAIT 20 OR SO MINUTES PER GAME ANYWAY
